preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 3 g of graphite powder. 
 2. Weigh 30 g of iron powder. 
 3. Take 12 g of samarium powder. 
 4. Measure 140 g of technetium-99m. 
 5. Combine all powders in a clean, dry glass container. 
 6. Stir thoroughly using a clean spatula until the mixture is homogeneous.
